nodes.text: The Imperial Engineering Volunteer was an Imperial badge awarded to individuals who had undergone "outstanding engineering support to the Empire during conflict."
One such badge was awarded to a spacer during the Empire Day festivities of 1 ABY.

The Imperial Engineering Volunteer appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
